Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Cylix
Description: Globular cylix with a rounded rim, curved walls with a groove at middle height and a stable base with ring-shaped foot. Paste of an orangey colour and exterior surface covered with a coating of a reddish colour, partially lost. The upper third presents a painted decoration consisting of vertically arranged teardrop motifs.
